item.title: Org mode - Tangle on file save
item.description: If you use org file to maintain your =init.el=, it is possible that many a times you need to tangle codes frequently. Below given is a couple of methods which will enable you to automatically tangle code snippets out of org mode file everytime the file is saved. Via toggle function A toggle function is one which you can enable/disable from M-x menu (call once to enable, call again to disable).
